TopicTitle: A way to make parts KAS compatible.

Articles.Content:
This would help people build better things (Small equipment and stuff) and chose parts to build with.

If there is a way, How can you make a part KAS Compatible?

You mean to grab them ?

EDIT- You might want this or make your own http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71683-A-Mechanic-Is-Jeb-or-KAS-For-Almost-Everything

EDIT- You can make a MM to grab everything or you want to keep it some what real ?

Edited January 13, 2015 by Mecripp2

Be warned that the restriction isn't there just to limit you. Physics still take effect and EVA packs have limited thrust, so if you carry something too large you won't be able to control it. Some of the items that are KAS compatible are too big really.

Of course. But it's KSP, so i'll do it Kerbal style (Grabs a booster)

You mean to grab them ?

EDIT- You might want this or make your own http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/71683-A-Mechanic-Is-Jeb-or-KAS-For-Almost-Everything

Hah, didnt know that exists and made every part KAS'able by myself (where it makes sense). Good thing I only had to do like 100 mods .
